name: User
description: Represents a user account in the system. This is the central entity that uniquely identifies every person who has access to the application. It stores basic identity information like username and email, along with language and timezone preferences. Sensitive information like passwords are stored separately in UserAuthentication for security reasons. Each user can have multiple active sessions, multiple two-factor authentication methods, and can create API keys for programmatic access. The user entity tracks the lifecycle of an account from registration through activation, suspension, and eventual deletion. It's the main reference point for all user-related operations in the system.

properties.name: username
properties.description: Unique username for login, cannot be changed once set

properties.name: email
properties.description: Primary email address used for account recovery and notifications

properties.name: emailVerified
properties.description: Whether the email address has been verified through confirmation link

properties.name: emailVerifiedAt
properties.description: Timestamp when the email was verified

properties.name: person
properties.description: Reference to personal information (name, date of birth, address, etc.)

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the user account

properties.name: statusReason
properties.description: Human-readable explanation for the current status

properties.name: statusChangedAt
properties.description: When the status was last changed

properties.name: locale
properties.description: User's preferred language and region for UI display

properties.name: timezone
properties.description: User's timezone for displaying dates and scheduling

properties.name: registeredAt
properties.description: When the user first signed up

properties.name: registrationSource
properties.description: How the user account was created

properties.name: registrationIp
properties.description: IP address used during registration for security tracking

properties.name: activatedAt
properties.description: When the account was activated and became usable

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version number to prevent concurrent update conflicts

examples.statusReason: Too many failed login attempts from unknown location
